No leading space, unordered list
---------------------------------
* a
* b
* c

two leading spaces, unordered list
--------------------------------
  * a
  * b
  * c

three leading spaces, unordered list
-----------------------------------

   * a
   * b
   * c

four leading spaces, unordered list
-----------------------------------

    * a
    * b
    * c

no leading spaces, ordered list
-----------------------------------

1. test

3. test
4. test

------------------------------------
